post_text: June 2, 2016 at 10:15 PM#1Goal...To write a macro that takes user input to define the Universe and Address of 10 sequential DMX remote lines.  So far I haven't had any luck getting a variable to place the address into the "dmx" column of the remote lines.why does this not work?setuservar $address=10.1                    -->    Results in variable = 10.1adduservar $address=0.1                     -->    Results in variable = 10.2000assign remote 3.1 /dmx=$address         -->    Results in DMX remote line not recognizing 10.2000I have tried numerous combinations to try and get the adduservar to maintain x.x instead of x.xxxx to no avail.And the "dmx" column in the remote line syntax only wants to see a x.x value.Any help would be appreciated.JB
title: DMX Remote Lines Through Macro
